name: The Tarkiff Transfer Incident
description:
The Tarkiff Transfer Incident - Most realities don't mix.

Explore what remains of Tarkiff, the city you once called home and uncover what happened.

Estimated runtime: 30-45~ minutes

This game was created live over the course of 3, 12 hour streams as an effort to raise money for Thankmas 2022. Thank you so much to everyone who checked out the devrun and I hope to do it 10x bigger next year.

The campain will be open until the end of December 2022 so until then you can still donate here.

If you wish to join me next year or keep up with me you can find me here:

Twitter

Twitch

Youtube

Known Bugs:

A bug which displays "Identification Required" on the screen every time you click [FIXED]
